summary: James and his three closest lifelong friends go on an ill-advised trip to the stunning coastal area of Barafundle Bay in West Wales. What follows is a touching and comical adventure dealing with friendship, heroism and love.
cast: Tom Burke|Benedict Cumberbatch|JJ Feild|Adam Robertson|Hugh Bonneville|Rupert Frazer|Helen Griffin|Karl Johnson|Nia Roberts|Eros Vlahos
title: Third Star
